title: New: Prom – Beauty Queen
content:
There can’t be too many songs written in ode to model and former cocaine addict Kate Moss, well, aside from the majority of Pete Doherty’s solo material of course.

Toronto’s Prom clearly share a rather bizarre fascination with the British Beauty Queen, penning this track for her. With Prom’s now stereotypical Berninger-esque drawl and ever-so dour and self-depreciating lyrics, it’s arguably their finest track to date. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
